website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, easily adjusted option, but other models offer better features for the price.
pros: Easy to adjust and fold design at a value price
Eco-friendly packaging that appeals to environment-conscious consumers
cons: Some users say they can hear noises not detectable with other shooting earmuffs we tested

customer_reviews.title: Even more useful than I expected, and a bargain at twice the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for use in a wood shop; they performed really well in that environment muffling the noise of multiple power saws and a planer. They have since gotten considerable use at home with equally satisfying results. They have come in handy in the current unusual public health situation with two adults regularly video conferencing and a child engaged in online learning in a tiny urban apartment! As comfortable as I would ever expect such headgear to be for wear over hours at a time on both large and smallish heads.
customer_reviews.author: 2cents

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: A buddy and I went to a weekend of auto racing and these earmuffs/ear protection we're invaluable! The product arrived ahead of schedule. Packaging was good, even kept the original box to store them in. Product itself is as as expected: relatively lightweight and adjustable. People with larger heads( you know who you are) might need to look at another vendor as these don't have a lot of "give" room. We used a little paracord to make a belt loop hook for when not using. Overall, would recommend for gun range, auto racing, fireworks, construction, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Troy W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the great price and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good quality. You cant go wrong.. i used them today while outside shooting the following Guns..(And kept the loud sounds out however you can still here a person tapking if you pay attention) GLOCK 26 (9mm) GLOCK 21 (45) and my friends GLOCK 40mm AR22 ( Can barely hear when rifle is shot) High point carbine rifle (9mm)
customer_reviews.author: MelissaW

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not the greatest for the indoor range
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, compact ear muffs for a wide range of uses. Purchased for gun range as primary use, but will use when angle grinder, blowing, drag races etc. Update: Went to the indoor range yesterday and was a little disappointed on how much of the sound came through compared to a pair used from a buddy the previous time we went. Probably use these as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbakd1

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I would enjoy wearing them for hours
customer_reviews.text: They work well. They arrived quickly. I bought them for my 2 1/2 year old. They work really well on his tiny head. The also work on me (7.5 sized head-ish) and are tight. They also fit his mom. I don't think I would enjoy wearing them for hours, but I could easily do construction and be fine. Keep in mind that these REDUCE sound. They don't eliminate sound. And you can hear everything. And It only reduces the sound by 34 dB. Its not a cone of silence. Or maybe it IS a cone of silence, but it's only a 13 dollar cone of silence. Ya know?
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Sounds great. Or should I say lack of sound is great!! In comparison these rated 34dB are not too significantly better than others that are rated at 25dB. But don't get me wrong there is a difference having 34dB, and it is worth it. But if there is something else catches your fancy don't fret about the number too much. Cans are all black in color, no grey color, that I received, in case anyone was wondering about different product pictures.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use these for our home improvement projects, i.e. to protect our ears from the loud oscillating saws, circular saws, table saws and normal hammering. They are comfortable enough and fit completely over our ears, even when I wear earrings. Though I can wear them for long, long stretches of time, they mess create a sensation of pressure inside my husband's ears and causes him discomfort. The earmuffs fold into the headband, making these more compact when not in use. It's a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Klassy Kat

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 3M H10A Earmuffs I Own
customer_reviews.text: Whenever using tools, mowing the lawn, or doing anything that's loud I always try to think of my hearing. I have a pair of 3M H10A earmuffs that work well and I decided I needed a second pair assuming I'd buy another pair of the same, but settled on these instead after comparing them. They seem really well made and I can't hear much of anything with these on. Personally, I think they're made better and will outlast the 3M product and I like how they compact when they fold up which the others don't do.
customer_reviews.author: James Madison

customer_reviews.title: Won't squish your head...
customer_reviews.text: Last fall I bought two pairs of earmuffs, a mossy oak low profile set for me and these for my wife. Today at the range after a couple hours of shooting I mentioned that it was about time to go because my head had been squished enough for the day. She didn't get what I meant, so I tried on her earmuffs and let her try mine. I could not believe the difference in comfort level over what I was wearing. These were so much more less compressive, lighter and cooler over what I had been wearing that I ordered myself a set as soon as I got home.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality, great noise reduction.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these are quite surprising. I bought the four pack initially for Monster Jam for my family (but we ended up not going...) but I've used them for other things. They do quite well reducing noise levels, and they fit my big head well. The wife and kids have tried them (smaller heads), although none of us have worn them for very extended periods, they seem to work for us. For the price and quality, they'll be hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A Great pair of Earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: The earmuffs closed out the noise of the TV completely. I didn't realize how much 34dBs of noise reduction actually was. It makes for a very satisfying noise reduction of gunfire also. I only gave it a 4 for comfort s I have a large head and it was a little tight on me, however, my wife's pair of muffs was quite satisfactory to her. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Good earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for outdoor shooting, but have used them indoors as well. Couldn't pass them up for the price. They work pretty well and fit over my ears well. I am a 24 year old female. However after a couple of hours they start to hurt a little where my safety glasses rest behind my ears. But still happy with this purchase and will continue to use them
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Headband not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: They seem nice for a nice price, but the headband is not adjustable. They seem to fit me ok, but maybe not others. I may have missed this in the listing. The ear cups are on the small side. My ears barely fit. They should be adequate for me for short sessions at the range. Don't know about the sound reduction yet. Indoor shooting ranges are very loud. Ordering and deliver were smooth and 2-day as advertised. No problem there. No issues with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Product rated A+
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product! Noise reduction rating of 34 decibles has to be very close. 30 feet from a top fuel dragster leaving the line and the noise level was very comfortable. Originally purchased for the gun range, have not been yet but as a US Navy Gunner's Mate and combat veteran, I am very confident these earmuffs will do the job, anywhere, anytime. Protect your hearing, always!
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Great protection at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Protection should be easy to obtain at a price that won't damage your wallet. These muffs are superior protection & stellar quality! A good fit for any head & make demonstrations at my hearing care practice easy... Thank you for offering a great product with an above average NRR rating for such a good price- Since my purchase of these muffs, I have recommended ALL my patients to Amazon to purchase this FSL 34dB NRR product........It's so important to protect yourself from noise induced hearing loss & this product is offered at the best price I have ever HEARD of! '
customer_reviews.author: K. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Just PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Under $9 , and they are PERFECT for shooting, unless you have square head like sponge Bob, like all these people that left bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Vlatko Trajcevski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They fit extremely well! And I was worried about the war cups being a leather material instead of the cloth ones on my computers headset, but they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to sleep and cancel noise of baby crying
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping with these earmuff for 2 months now. The first 2 nights was a real nightmare, but after I got use too. However, you must sleep on your back. I am using these earmuff with the combination of earplug that way I do not get awake when my little 6 months baby cry (my wife take care of her during the night). After 4 weeks of use, I got a small skin reaction. Around my ears, a little red appeared and the skin got dry. I used some eczema cream and was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good performance
customer_reviews.text: I use these, along with ear plugs, to go to an indoor shooting range. Pretty good performance, but I'm taking a star off because safety glasses do not fit well with these. The glasses pull the cups off the ear a bit, lowering the performance of the earmuffs. Eye protection and ear protection go hand-in-hand, so I'm surprised that they didn't optimize for this. It's a super simple design fix.
customer_reviews.author: GerryH

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: After sampling and owning a number of different headsets, these have been the least expensive (Amazon), best comfort with optimum noise supersion. On cool days I wear a hood and these have also performed the best with the extra material. Most of my usage is Dixie Chopper mowers with Occassional firearms practice.
customer_reviews.author: Wings

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Likes it for the price, but one thing I don't like is it's a bit too tight for me, not a very big con but wished it was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: Excellent......
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. I had bought a pair of foam plugs for 12 bucks at my local gun store, then found these. Excellent quality, great noise cancellation. Do not buy if you need to hear, they block out most of the sound of someone standing next to you talking. Great for the range.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear protection!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to use when working with equipment outside and for shooting. So far I have only used them while mowing and I must say that they are comfortable and most importantly do an excellent job cutting down the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like these earmuffs very much. I am using them when I mow the lawn and they block out a lot of the engine noise. I have a small head and they fit me well and are adjustable. They are comfortable for me on my head. A larger headed person may find them uncomfortable after extended use. The padding is very comfortable on the muffs around the ears and on the top of the head. The price was great compared to other brands. And, they look good. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Great earmuffs for the range. Shot for an hour with 9mm and 5.56. Noise reduction was very good and was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, effective and comfortable hearing protection
customer_reviews.text: These really protect my hearing whilst mowing my lawn. They're light in weight and comfortable on my ears. They fit my XXL cranium very nicely. They held up throughout the summer very well, being used maybe a dozen times in total without any damage to the vinyl or foam, and without any smelliness inside. These are well worth the price, especially considering that they are far from being near the top end of the price range for ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Charles Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I made a funny. My wife and I shoot a lot and ...
customer_reviews.text: Put these on when I took my wife to the shooting range and I couldn't hear anything. Well, I could hear the range officer tell me when the range was hot, but I sure couldn't hear my wife telling me that she was tired, cold and wanted to leave. Ha, Ha, I made a funny. My wife and I shoot a lot and these babies really do the job at the range and they were well priced for what we needed. I like them a lot, you will too.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD HATFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Survived 180 db NHRA
customer_reviews.text: Bought kind of last minute (a week before I needed them) my old pair of earmuffs got cracked in moving, desided to go with these ones, showed up 3 days before the 2016 NHRA northwest finals, the topfuel and funny cars run buy you at 180 db and these earmuffs cut it down to safe levels, work great
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: High quality; good price
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily for weed whacking, leaf blowing, and while using my riding mower. They do the job perfectly and are a nice replacement for my older, more expensive pair. I like that they fold together for storage in my shed because the mice destroyed the foam in the brand I used previously when they decided to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Well made and effective.
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are very good, especially for the price. They are solidly built, well crafted and fit snuggly and comfortably. I used them at the shooting range and the sound muting was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Philip T.

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: These work fine, but are a bit thick. If using for shooting, they get in the way of rifle but stock
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good noise reduction
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have complained that this presses too hard on your head. It does press hard, because it takes significant pressure to seal out the outside sounds. A 34 dB rating is high, so it will NOT be as comfortable as a 25 or 28 dB NRR unit. I accept that, and I can wear these for 2 hours at a time without pain or irritation. You do know they are there, but it is not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ken wells

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for shooting and they work great. We didn't shoot any rifles or shotguns, but every caliber of handgun and these are adequate for the job. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Cheap Price
customer_reviews.text: for the price im surprised by how well these work! although I wish they were slimmer they do surpress a great deal of sound and protect your ears. There not 100% sound blocking but for me at least 85% when you put them on...Id even say 90%. worth the buy for sure
customer_reviews.author: djginyc

customer_reviews.title: Great product - these fold up into a compact size
customer_reviews.text: Great product - these fold up into a compact size, fit multiple head sizes, and importantly cut down on machine shop/tool noise very well. They can get a little uncomfortable for longer durations, and are strong enough top press your (safety/regular) glasses into the sides of your head. Not distracting, but I can feel the slight pinch after a few minutes. The ear cups are flexible enough to seal over glasses, dust mask bands, etc.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Best earmuff for protection...period!
customer_reviews.text: Great hearing protection but just wish they were a bit smaller. Don't be fooled by expensive electronic ear muffs, they are more money only because they amplify sound, but they don't protect nearly as well as passive earmuffs like this one. You will not find another earmuff rated at 34 nrr.
customer_reviews.author: Vp9guy

customer_reviews.title: Great hearing protection, made well, a little bit tight
customer_reviews.text: Great hearing protection, well made, easy to clean. They are a bit tight, however, so taking them off is always a great feeling. Hard to find a good cross between superior hearing protection and comfort, but these are worth the money and will do what you need - keep your hearing safe.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Ruzbasan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ear muffs because they toned done that loud mower sound, which I m pretty sure is not good for my ears. Also I walked around with them afterwards and when I took them off I realized there were things out there I had to listen to that I didn't miss. Anyways good idea to used these earmuffs they are comfy also.
customer_reviews.author: SAL LY P

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied... Good buy!  Read the review it's done over time..
customer_reviews.text: They press firmly against you, although seem comfortable. You can tell they are very quiet. Better than some cheap ones. I'll update as time passes on durability. Date today is 9/23/2016 It's now May of 2017 and I'm still very Pleases with these. they haven't broke or the head band is holding up fine. Really satisfied... Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: murfonline

customer_reviews.title: Do what they say they do ... inexpensively
customer_reviews.text: 1. Work. Very, very well. These things do what they say they do. 2. Tight. 'Tis true. But so are most hearing protectors, so that's not unique to this model. It's the nature of this type of product. 3. Light. I'm surprised how well these work given their weight. I've purchased far heavier muffs, which worked far less well, in my life. 4. Incredible value. What a bargain. Highly recommend. And I'm not some paid reviewer, either.
customer_reviews.author: Oroboros

customer_reviews.title: It works better than the RCA noise cancelling headphones she had before
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife to use at her workplace's open layout. It works better than the RCA noise cancelling headphones she had before. While she can still tell when people are talking around her, the voices sound muffled and distant. There seems to be enough padding to be comfortable for long periods of use.
customer_reviews.author: iandw

customer_reviews.title: These muffs with well and are comfortable for extended range time
customer_reviews.text: These muffs with well and are comfortable for extended range time. Coming off a very uncomfortable pair, it has made a world of difference. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Value at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs work very well at dampening sound. They of course do not eliminate sound entirely. You will hear lawn mowers or loud vehicles pass by your window for example. Nonetheless, the sound you do hear is greatly softened. I have an open office in a loft, and using these muffs is like having walls all around me. It is quiet enough to concentrate and that is why I bought these in the first place. They do that job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great ear protection for the price. There are things that could be better (e.g. The ear pieces staying folded-in better when the unit is being stored, the way the ear pieces attach to the head band could be sturdier), but for the price these are great. They do a great job muffling sound and are at the right price!
customer_reviews.author: Appoli

customer_reviews.title: ... for the Nascar race in Kansas and it worked wonderfully, use it for shooting practice as well
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the Nascar race in Kansas and it worked wonderfully, use it for shooting practice as well. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John Eby

customer_reviews.title: and I've shot for fun and sport for over 40 years
customer_reviews.text: Quieter than any set I've ever used....and I've shot for fun and sport for over 40 years. Don't expect they'll last more than a couple years, but as effective as they are and given the price, I'd be ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Okay.  Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: These work, though not as well as I'd like. I guess you get what you pay for. The adjustment is just barely enough to fit my head and I'd sure like it if they shut out more of the external noise. My old, worn out second-hand ones did a better job. Still, they work, so I'm using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picked these up from Amazon for about $17. What ...
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up from Amazon for about $17. What an improvement over my old hearing protection. These collapse onto themselves, seal the ear very well. Worth every penny! Been shooting three times and like these more and more each time. The packaging box (not shipping box) makes for great storage in the range bag.
customer_reviews.author: Peoria AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids watching monster trucks
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect if you know what you're getting. I bought these for my three year old and 5 year old and they fit them perfect. I could not adjust the length but for my kids and for the price they worked as intended and protected their ears from the monster truck rally.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Grey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good earmuff's for the price. I bought 2 pairs a little over a year ago. They are comfortable and easily adjustable. My only problem is that the ear inserts fall out easily now. I can't find a number to contact FSL for there hassle free 3 year warranty they advertise. If they would stay in 1 piece I would continue to wear them and give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear these in addition to the ear piece and it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I use a custom made ear piece and still fin the sound at the range bothersome. I wear these in addition to the ear piece and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: RWS

customer_reviews.title: Very quite and comfortable. Comparable to more expensive earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Very quite and comfortable. Comparable to more expensive earmuffs. Even works great with rifles. This pair has served me well on many range trips.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Painful, doesn't block out noise well
customer_reviews.text: Very painful to wear and did not block out sound as I hoped it would. I could still hear people talking and footsteps in the hallway. I was looking for extreme sound isolation, which these did not offer. Two stars because maybe I misunderstood how they would work and people just wanted to muffle sounds and not block them out.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: 34dB Reduction!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these since the 34dB reduction is one of the highest & best I could find online. Have worked great so far with my chainsaw, riding mower, & pneumatic nail gun. Definitely comfortable for long periods & I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill in Austin

customer_reviews.title: It is so nice to be able to work without our ears ringing
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a second pair of these for when we are working in the yard sawing wood and even using the shop vacuum. It is so nice to be able to work without our ears ringing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wingard

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I ordered one of these about a year ago and now ordered another pair for my son. We use them at the range and like them much better than using plugs. I would recommend this product to someone who wanted affordable ear protection.
customer_reviews.author: D Loizzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use when cutting the grass
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy to use when cutting the grass.
customer_reviews.author: mapicsman

customer_reviews.title: Nice set or earmuffs bit was advertised as a four ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set or earmuffs bit was advertised as a four pack yet only one came to me. Amazon are you asleep at the wheel?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Good - might look for notched ones for range shooting
customer_reviews.text: Good sound protection and quality seems to be fine. Only thing to watch out for, if you are using this for rifle range shooting, is it extends pretty far from your ear so you might bump up against your stock.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Enemark

customer_reviews.title: These were comfortable and dropped nose to an acceptable
customer_reviews.text: I use these on planes over iems to listen to music without having to turn up loud to overcome engine noise. These were comfortable and dropped nose to an acceptable level
customer_reviews.author: Music Fan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to wear at the gun range. Very comfortable and the noise reduction is excellent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Warren

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They really do eliminate a lot of noise and they feel comfortable on my head even wearing glasses. I like the way they fold up into a smaller bundle to put in the tool box. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs work great! They are just somewhat tight on your head but manageable. They work way better than what I have had in the past. I am satisfied with how much quieter it is but the pressure is the only thing that makes it a little uncomfortable. All in all I feel like this is worth the money paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: These do not compare well to the cheap Winchester earmuffs from Walmart. The cushion is not very conforming, so with my glasses on these do not protect well. My aviation headset and other earmuffs I have tried are much better with glasses.
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them received them timely cost okay. Fit when tried them on have not used them yet at the shooting range. Plan to get a shotgun thus buying ear muffs before hand. Will update after I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Oldsoldier22

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: These would be good noise protection,,,maybe we have big heads (we tried on 6 people) they they are to tight on the head nice soft cushions nice compact design
customer_reviews.author: Zonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for hearing protection
customer_reviews.text: Doing a great job of blocking sound, though a bit tight around the head until you break them in. I'm using them to reduce noise from power tools and similar equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter T Schwisow

customer_reviews.title: The price was great and they feel really well made
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs really do drop the sounds around you. Shots are still audible, but don't hurt your ears at all when wearing these. The price was great and they feel really well made. For the price I was worried that they'd feel cheap, but these really are great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harter

customer_reviews.title: Well-made for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and well-made in Taiwan. Worked great at the range. A real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Le Fish

customer_reviews.title: Well made FSL earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on, after trying it on my boys. (Both sensory sensitive) It looks big, but the thing is really light. It fits all of us and muffles noises well. Came fairly quick in the mail. Adequate packaging.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the bulky side, but you really ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the bulky side, but you really are getting what you pay for. They sometimes create a bit of suction which can be uncomfortable, but I have gotten used to them. I'll probably pick up a higher quality pair and use these as a back-up pair or for anyone who wants to go shooting with me.
customer_reviews.author: DjWreck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from this because of the price. But all the reviews were correct. They block out sound better than my friend's earmuffs and he paid twice as much. Great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great sound protection when target practicing, exactly what I was wanted. The earmuffs fit comfortably on your head and ears.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Strong Protection
customer_reviews.text: They definitely block sound. I've compared them to earplugs rated for the same strength (34dB), and these earmuffs work much better. If they prove durable, them they are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sims

customer_reviews.title: protect your hearing
customer_reviews.text: this will do it for sure. good quality and great fit
customer_reviews.author: biscot

customer_reviews.title: I have had far better results with the foam ear buds
customer_reviews.text: What excited to receive this based on reviews. I put it on immediately after it was delivered. as soon put these on, a truck drove by my house and I could hear it as clear as day. I have had far better results with the foam ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to try these on, but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to try these on, but I will say “BEWARE!” this is not a x4 pack. I only received one set and am seriously considering returning them.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: Should be good
customer_reviews.text: Received these in short order. Have not had a chance to shoot with them yet, but in trying them on, seems to be comfy and quiet so looking good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son...he likes them..doesn't block all sound. He can still hear us talking if we are directly in front of him or standing close..but he likes that even though he can hear us talking the other sounds around are drowned out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear you!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable. Took them to NRA finals. Still feel the pounding when cars go by you but doesn't hurt as much.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jerald

customer_reviews.title: My Hearing is Saved!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this brand! The Safety Earmuffs are just that! They work perfectly! They protect my ears from direct harm from loud noises while still able to sense someone needing my attention, while I work. I was surprised by the comfort! I have a large noggin, wearing an L/XL hat size & these earmuffs fit nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The earmuffs were just as pictured. Nice quality and very comfortable. They fit snug and really cut out the noise well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Greet earmuffs for the gun range.
customer_reviews.text: Great earmuffs that make going to the range much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: m11mw

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We use these at the range. I loved them so much that I bought two pairs. Bonus, they are cheap
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and keep the noise down at the range
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and keep the noise down at the range. Great price too- will purchase again when we need a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Musically Inclined

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable. Block out noise well. Little on bulky side but very nice
customer_reviews.author: Marty Meade

customer_reviews.title: Great for hand-gun shooting. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Great value. Fold up nicely to fit into a bag. Great for pistol shooting, however if shooting a rifle, they can get in the way of a good cheek-weld if using iron sights.
customer_reviews.author: RJH85

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what i paid for
customer_reviews.text: Product stated 4 pack when I purchased. I only got 1.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Finally Earmuffs that really work :)
customer_reviews.text: My son has ASD and we have tried many many different earmuffs and these he is finally happy with! I wish they stretched a little bigger so they were a little more comfortable but all in all a winner
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They look good but are a gift so will keep you posted as to how him likes them
customer_reviews.author: Kay Shakespear

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son, he states they are comfortable and effectively blocks out a lot of sound. Will be getting another pair for my husband
customer_reviews.author: A. Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy! I really am pleased.I like the way they fold into a smaller package. Fits in my back pack neatly for shooting.
customer_reviews.author: 101st Airborne Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, good price
customer_reviews.text: These feel great in the hand and on the head - well made, no rough spots or snags. They truly dampen the sounds very well. At this price I'm glad to have a second pair in my range bag
customer_reviews.author: Master Tinkerer

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the bad - noisy stuff.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great investment to protect your ears in noisy environments.They are of good quality and adjust to fit very easily. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection, Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. 34db rating is perfect for hearing protection at the shooting range, doing yard work and when using power tools. They are comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: RUOK

customer_reviews.title: 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: After 4 month of daily use I don't like this product if you drop it you'll have to put all the parts togethers
customer_reviews.author: Jose Lopez

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. I cant believe how well these work ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. I cant believe how well these work for the price.... we are very happy with them...
customer_reviews.author: KEITH RICKERMAN

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We use these when the force dryer to dry off dogs is being used in our dog grooming facility they work very well as well as fold up compact very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight. Great sound muffling though.
customer_reviews.text: These muffle sound incredibly well but are way too tight on the temples with no way of adjusting the pressure. My head isn't all that big.
customer_reviews.author: Karian

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for my kids on the range. They are larger, but not overly so. Everything we needed to keep the kids ears safe. I tried them out before I let them wear them while we were at the range. Good buy for the money. The pack up nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: John F johnson

product_meta.title: FSL Decimate Earmuffs 34dB NRR Protection - Professional Ear Defenders for Shooting - 3 Year Warranty
product_meta.description:
Perfect for hunting, shooting, drumming, home improvement, construction or even studying in silence, the FSL Decimate safety earmuffs offer a one-stop solution for full hearing protection and noise reduction. Comfortable, durable, affordable and backed by a 3-year warranty, these are the obvious choice for anyone looking to protect their ears.

Rugged and reliable construction These folding earmuffs are built to endure harsh weather and tough conditions—exactly the kind you might encounter when hunting or shooting outdoors. Durable, high quality materials ensure that these ear defenders will last you through wind, dirt, rain, and more.

Comfortable, adjustable fit Soft padding allows you to freely spend long hours wearing these noise reduction earmuffs, and fit is adjustable for any head size. Simply slide the cups along the headband to find the perfect fit for you.

Convenient storage Easily fold these shooting earmuffs in half for efficient storage. The folding mechanism also makes them portable, which means when you take them out on the road they won't take up any more space than necessary.

Eco-friendly, easy-to-open packaging The FSL ear defenders, unlike many hunting earmuffs, will arrive at your door in easy-open, frustration-free packaging. This packaging is also eco-friendly, because at FSL we value protecting the environment and we know you do too.

Product Specifications Noise Reduction Rate (NNR): 34dB
Conforms to ANSI/ ISEA S12.42:2010 (S3.19), American National Standard
Includes hassle-free 3 year warranty
feature_bullets: Ideal for extremely loud environments, these safety earmuffs boast a Noise Reduction Rating of 34dB
Foldable for efficient storage and safekeeping and comes in easy-to-open, eco-friendly packaging
Earmuffs are fully adjustable, the cups slide along the headband to accommodate every head size
Soft padded headband and cups ensure comfort for long term use
